titleStmt.title: The Engagement vindicated; from all the objections, cavils, scruples, that wilfull opposers, or doubtfull, unresolved judgements may cast upon it. Wherein, all such objections are answered; the government proved; the Engagement it self both lawful, and necessary, from clearest principles of conscience and reason. To the satisfaction of all such as are doubting. / By T.B.
titleStmt.author: T. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Mab and A. Coles for T.B. and are sold at the sign of the Angel in Corn-hil,

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan: 7th 1649"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Angel in Corn-hil
